title: Results table with expandable score details
description: Display the detailed results for each case in a run. Each row should be expandable to show individual scorer scores, reasons, and evidence. This is the deep-dive debugging view.
acceptance_criteria: Columns: case name, status, overall score, execution time, actions
Expanded view shows: score per scorer, reason, evidence list
implementation_notes: Evidence may be a list - render as bullet points
Consider virtualization for runs with many cases
MLflow link format: external link to trace viewer
